question.subject: Do you have Ebola?
Are you currently bleeding out of EVERY hole you have?
If you were in a movie, how would you be credited?
How much Ebola do you have.

option.statement: I got a lot of Ebola.

question.subject: If you had a disease which one would it be?

option.statement: Picture that says "not Ebola" but in virus form

question.subject: Over 3000 people have died of Ebola this year. Are you one of them?
How often do you hang around bodily fluids of Ebola patients?

option.statement: I don't hang around bodily fluids of Ebola patients (Hint!! This is the right answer)

question.subject: Do you breathe around Ebola people on a regular basis.
question.desc: Trick question. It's not transmitted that way doe. Just don't lick them or do gross stuff.

question.subject: Is this you?
How are you feeling today?

option.statement: Great! Other that the throwing up and I'm super hot and I got aches every where and I can't stop doin number two and I got rashes and red eyes and and my chest hurts and I can't swallow and I'm bleeding all over the place.

question.subject: Do you have the Reston strain of Ebola?

option.statement: I'm a fruitbat. And yeah, it sucks.

question.subject: Why do you butcher animals with Ebola? That's how you get Ebola!

option.statement: Because I'm not afraid of Ebola.
Because I have Ebola and I don't care if I get more Ebola

question.subject: Have you ticked off any fast food workers that definitely have Ebola?

option.statement: Yeah. And my food tasted like spit. And Ebola.

question.subject: Have you been to West Africa and drank out of The Ebola River while hanging out with fruit bats?

option.statement: No way man I don't like fruit or bats
Not a good vacation spot. Nope.

question.subject: How long ago did the Ebola guy spit in your eye?
Did you eat some sketchy vegetables and now you can't get off the toilet?
Did you eat some sketchy vegetables and now you can't get off the toilet?
A guy with Ebola just dropped a Dorito out of his mouth. Did you eat it?
I don't have Ebola
Fill in the blank. I have _____

option.statement: A strong set of skills that are immensely undervalued
